attributes.action: Implement the recommendations from the 7 existing reports into racial inequality
attributes.additional_details:
The reports include:

1. Beyond the data: Understanding the
impact of COVID-19 on BAME groups

2. Windrush Lessons Learned Review Independent review

3. Race in the workplace:

4. Report of the Independent Review of Deaths and Serious Incidents in Police Custody

5. Race Disparity Audit

6. An independent review into the treatment of, and outcomes for, Black, Asian and Minority Ethnic individuals in the Criminal Justice System

We note that only 60 of 1250 Windrush victims have been compensated.
attributes.background:
The UK government has failed to implement 7 reports into racial inequality, including the Windrush Report and Race in the workplace.  
These reports contain over 200 recommendations. Before any further review, we seek the immediate implementation of the recommendations contained in these reports.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327671

We have also published several petitions about race and equality more widely, which you can view here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&topic=race-and-equality
